scripts.upload: npm prune --production && zip -0 -r out.zip index.js node_modules/ && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name FetchSenacorEvents --zip-file fileb://out.zip --region us-east-1
scripts.invoke: aws lambda invoke --function-name FetchSenacorEvents --region us-east-1 --log-type Tail --invocation-type RequestResponse out.log | jq -r .LogResult  | base64 --decode
